# windowShouldClose(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the user has attempted to close a window or the window has received a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/performClose(_:)] message.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func windowShouldClose(_ sender: NSWindow) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The window being closed.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to allow `sender` to be closed; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

This method may not always be called during window closing. Specifically, this method is not called when a user quits an application.

## Closing Windows

- **windowWillClose(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the window is about to close.
